Tonight, we'll be discussing the idea of Emotional Minimalism. I hope you're able to join in!  #ppdchat
What does the term "Emotional Minimalism" bring to mind?  #ppdchat
Emotional minimalism, for me, at least, means living a life with as little emotional baggage as possible.  #ppdchat
A minimalistic approach to life is a simple one - less is more. So an emotional minimalistic life is one in which you let go. #ppdchat
Instead of holding onto the past and the pain, you learn to process it and move forward. Is it easy? Hell no. Worth it? Hell yes. #ppdchat
@unxpctdblessing this is so relevant for me right now - sibling stuff, changing old patterns #ppdchat
@DoNotFaint It's tough to let go of the baggage, isn't it? Things that have defined us for so long.  #ppdchat
Here's the thing - we can let our baggage weigh us down & define us or we can refuse to give it permission to do so. #ppdchat
@unxpctdblessing I ask myself "I feel x, but will talking about it release or feed that?" I can let go of more than I thought. #ppdchat

In just 7 minutes, join me to discuss rage & irritability as symptoms of #PPD in  #PPDChat
Welcome to the evening edition of  #PPDChat
Grab a chair, a snack, a drink - make yourself at home and let's get started. Tonight, we're talking about rage. #PPDChat
For me, unjustified rage/irritability is one of the first signs that I am heading toward depression.  #PPDChat
Is rage something you think of as a symptom or indicator of depression?  #PPDChat
“@unxpctdblessing: For me, unjustified rage/irritability is one of the first signs that I am heading toward depression.  #PPDChat” me too.
@unxpctdblessing definitely. Until PPD it was my primary depression symptom.  #ppdchat
@unxpctdblessing Yes, when I get really mad then I realize something is off. Not proud but little control... #ppdchat
@MamatoaMonkey How did you cope with the rage?  #PPDChat
@Foodiemental Same here. It's like it comes out of nowhere... #PPDChat
If you have struggled with rage/irritability as a symptom of depression or PPD, how did you cope with it?  #PPDChat
@unxpctdblessing I turned the strong emotions toward the ppd and anxiety. It was like "eat this you stupid ppd!" #ppdchat
RT @AnaRouds: @unxpctdblessing I turned the strong emotions toward the ppd and anxiety. It was like "eat this you stupid ppd!" #ppdchat
@AnaRouds I LOVE that. :D  #PPDChat
@unxpctdblessing I need time alone to calm down and breathe and remind myself that everything is really fine. #ppdchat
@Foodiemental Do you struggle taking that time for yourself when you're around others? Or do you just go somewhere?  #PPDChat
I recall how awful it was growing up seeing someone irritable all the time. When I feel my self in that space, I know I'm off #ppdchat
@unxpctdblessing in the car, I'd tell hubs I named some quiet time. He knows what it means. At work, I go for a walk. #ppdchat
@AnaRouds I'm generally a happy person so I know if I am angry and grumpy, there's something not right there.  #PPDChat
@Foodiemental It's good that he understands what that means. It's helpful when your spouse gets it.  #PPDChat
I know what you mean about generally being happy @unxpctdblessing . When I become short tempered, it means I need to slow down. #ppdchat
@AnaRouds For me, it means I need to pay more attention to my sleep patterns. (and slow down too)  #PPDChat
I also remember screaming at my husband about the tv volume as my descent into ppd began. I had no idea why I was so mad. #ppdchat
@unxpctdblessing Yes - lack of sleep messes with my mood big time. #ppdchat.
@AnaRouds Yeah, when little things like that set us off, it's a good indication something isn't right.  #PPDChat
@AnaRouds This is the first time in two years that I haven't had severe insomnia in January. *knocks on wood*  #PPDChat
@unxpctdblessing Awesome. That hopefully means you are doing things to take care of yourself. #ppdchat
@AnaRouds I am. Back on medication for the 1st time since PPD. Between Sandy, SAD, & issues with former neighbors, I spiraled. #PPDChat
@AnaRouds I'm almost at the 6wk mark with meds now and the difference is remarkable. Relieved.  #PPDChat
@unxpctdblessing The decision to take medication for mood/anxiety disorders is tough. But when my brain chem. is off, I need it. #ppdchat
@AnaRouds Me too, apparently. The NP said I may just need it during the winter months for the SAD.  #PPDChat
@unxpctdblessing That makes sense. Plus, like you said, you had a lot of other factors. #ppdchat
@AnaRouds *nods* That I did. It all snowballed together and just got bigger..and bigger... #PPDChat
